articles.title: Your Complete Guide To Seeing The 2024 Total Solar Eclipse—According To Experts - Forbes
articles.description: On April 8, North America will experience a total solar eclipse. To witness totality, viewers need to plan ahead and be within the narrow path of totality. Here's how.
